## API

-   **See: wxapp: regeneratorRuntime is not defined [https://developers.weixin.qq.com/community/develop/doc/a39569a8bd172ab387dc2f8c4a80ee8f][37]**
-   **See: Documentation: SyntaxError: Using the
    export keyword between a decorator and a class is not allowed.Please use `export @dec class`
    instead. [https://github.com/documentationjs/documentation/issues/996#issuecomment-423644403][38]**

### config

配置对象

### model

#### Parameters

-   `body` **[Object][39]** 
    -   `body.id` **[number][40]** 
    -   `body.relationship` **[string][41]** 
-   `params` **[Object][39]** 
-   `headers` **[Object][39]** 

#### Examples

```javascript
Basic Usage
User.get({
   id: 1,
   relationship: 'json',
   msg: 'test',
   ...
 },
 {'X-tag': 'costom-tag'}
)
```

### model

返回当前类的类名

#### Examples

```javascript
class Test extends API {}
this.model
// test
```

### get

#### Parameters

-   `body` **[Object][39]**  (optional, default `{}`)
    -   `body.id` **[number][40]** 
    -   `body.relationship` **[string][41]** 
-   `headers` **[Object][39]**  (optional, default `{}`)
-   `params` **[Object][39]** 

#### Examples

```javascript
Basic Usage
User.get({
   id: 1,
   relationship: 'json',
   msg: 'test',
   ...
 },
 {'X-tag': 'costom-tag'}
)
```

Returns **any** 

### patch

#### Parameters

-   `body` **any** 
-   `headers` **any**  (optional, default `{}`)

Returns **any** 

### delete

#### Parameters

-   `id` **any** 
-   `headers` **any**  (optional, default `{}`)

Returns **any** 

### self

#### Parameters

-   `params` **any**  (optional, default `{}`)
-   `headers` **any**  (optional, default `{}`)

Returns **any** 

### post

#### Parameters

-   `body` **any** 
-   `headers` **any**  (optional, default `{}`)

Returns **any** 

### setHeader

#### Parameters

-   `header` **any**  (optional, default `{}`)

### all

返回所有的资源

#### Parameters

-   `params` **any**  (optional, default `{}`)
-   `headers` **any**  (optional, default `{}`)

Returns **any** 

### getById

通过 id 来获取资源

#### Parameters

-   `id` **any** 
-   `params` **any**  (optional, default `{}`)
-   `headers` **any**  (optional, default `{}`)

Returns **any**

#### Parameters

-   `params` **any**  (optional, default `{}`)
-   `headers` **any**  (optional, default `{}`)

Returns **any** 

### create

#### Parameters

-   `params` **any**  (optional, default `{}`)
-   `headers` **any**  (optional, default `{}`)

Returns **any** 

### onError

统一的错误处理,默认控制台打印

#### Parameters

-   `e` **any** 

## baseURL

设置 baseURL

### Parameters

-   `url` **[string][41]** 

### Examples

基本用法


```javascript
@baseURL('localhost:3000')
class Base extends API {}

class User extends Base {
 // ...
}
User.getById(1)
// localhost:3000/user/1
```

## config

设置`axios.defaults`

### Parameters

-   `customConfig` **any** 

### Examples

```javascript
@config({
  baseURL: 'http://localhost:7002',
  timeout: 1000,
  data: {
    msg: 'test'
  }
})
class Speech extends API { }
```

Returns **any**
